statements: SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition;
SELECT waste_type, composition FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE date_collected = '2022-01-01';
SELECT composition, amount FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, date_collected FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE composition LIKE '%paper%';
SELECT id, waste_type, amount FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE date_collected = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE waste_type = 'Organic' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT composition, amount FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE amount >= 100 AND date_collected = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, waste_type, date_collected FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE amount < 50 OR waste_type = 'Recyclable' ORDER BY date_collected ASC;
SELECT id, waste_type, composition, amount, date_collected FROM BiodegradableWasteComposition WHERE waste_type <> 'Plastic' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_composition;
SELECT waste_type, percentage FROM biodegradable_waste_composition WHERE percentage > 50;
SELECT description FROM recycling_composting_processes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ecological_impact WHERE impact_area = 'Water';
SELECT id, process_name FROM recycling_composting_processes ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_composition WHERE percentage > 0.5 ORDER BY percentage DESC;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM biodegradable_waste_composition GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM recycling_composting_processes WHERE process_name LIKE 'Recycling%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecological_impact WHERE impact_area = 'Land' AND impact_description LIKE '%deforestation%';
SELECT process_name, description FROM recycling_composting_processes WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste;
SELECT id, waste_type, waste_weight FROM biodegradable_waste ORDER BY waste_weight DESC;
SELECT waste_type, waste_weight FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE waste_weight > 100 ORDER BY waste_weight ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM composting_facilities WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY location;
SELECT id, recycle_rate, collection_date FROM recycling_statistics WHERE recycle_rate < 50 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT waste_weight, waste_type FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE waste_weight > 100;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM composting_facilities WHERE capacity >= 500;
SELECT waste_type, recycle_rate FROM recycling_statistics WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, waste_type FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE compostable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste;
SELECT waste_id, category FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT location, capacity FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM composting_facilities WHERE location = 'City ABC';
SELECT facility_name, facility_id FROM composting_facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Green%';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste ORDER BY weight DESC, waste_id ASC;
SELECT category, weight FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE category = 'Food Waste' AND weight > 5;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM composting_facilities WHERE facility_id IN (SELECT facility_id FROM waste_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15');
SELECT analysis_id, composition FROM waste_analysis JOIN biodegradable_waste ON waste_analysis.waste_id = biodegradable_waste.waste_id WHERE weight < 10;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE weight >= 5 AND category LIKE '%Plastic%' ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_composition;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM biodegradable_waste_composition WHERE percentage > 0.5;
SELECT site_name, location, contact_person FROM waste_collection_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM composting_processes WHERE process_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, percentage FROM biodegradable_waste_composition WHERE material_type='organic';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_composition
SELECT material_name, percentage FROM biodegradable_waste_composition ORDER BY percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM recycling_processes UNION SELECT process_name, process_description FROM composting_processes

SELECT wr.material_id, wr.date_analyzed, bw.material_name, ws.site_name FROM waste_analysis_results wr JOIN biodegradable_waste_composition bw ON wr.material_id = bw.material_id JOIN waste_collection_sites ws ON wr.site_id = ws.site_id ORDER BY wr.date_analyzed DESC
